alert.note: Alert for Coachella Valley; San Diego County Deserts; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Excessive Heat Warning issued June 11 at 7:38PM PDT until June 12 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM SUNDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously hot conditions with temperatures up to 116 expected. Low temperatures will mostly be in the 80s, providing little relief. * WHERE...San Diego County Deserts, Coachella Valley and San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning. * WHEN...Until 8 PM Sunday. * IMPACTS...Extreme heat will significantly increase the potential for heat related illnesses, particularly for those working or participating in outdoor activities.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors.

area.areaDesc: Coachella Valley; San Diego County Deserts; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning
